page.title: 18THE DISTRICT CENTRE,SINFIN.
page.content: At the district centre in Sinfin there are 12 shops, hypermarket, garage, health centre and library. The hypermarket is called Fine Fare and it sells everything from clothes pegs to food to gardening tools. There is a newsagent, frozen food store, betting shop, greengrocer, butcher, shoe shop, wool shop, video shop, post office, chemist, building society office,dry cleaning shop and a chip shop. At the district centre there is a library from which you can borrow records and cassettes as well as books. There is a medical centre with a doctor, dentist and chiropodist. The district centre is a pedestrian shopping area. It has its own neatly laid out car park with its own petrol station and car repair garage. The centre is quite new, being only about 8 years old. By Simon Willcox.
